tool.name: SourceBatchCheckTool
tool.summary:
Run this tool to check source files form source batch directory (eg. D:\process_data\source_batch) before starting working on the batch. It will

1) Checking missing files for Shapefiles or GeoTIFF files

2) Checking exceptional files , which do not belong to any ShapeFiles or GeoTIFF files

3) Check large .shp and .tif files which are bigger than 2 G

All files from above three checking will be listed in the log file, for exaple: D:\process_data\log\process.log
tool.usage:
1. Displaying a source batch directory, eg. D:\process_data\source_batch

2. Clicking Run, results will be in processing log file
